name: Nayma
greetingText: Here’s to the laughs we’ve shared!
wishText: Wishing you endless happiness and success today and always! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday! Another year, another chance to chase your dreams and make them come true.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. We will meet soon In Sha Allah!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
